text: neohuiga seon-eul haenghamae ineun neo hui seuseuloleul wihan seonhaeng-iyo neohui ga saagham-eul haengham-eun neohui seuseulo ege dol-aganeun geos-ila geulihayeodubeonjjae gyeong-goga ileuleoss-eulttae hananim eun jeogdeul-eul bonaeeo neohui eolgul-eul suchiseuleobge hago neohui sinjeon-e deulge hani geudeul-eun cheoeum-e deul-eogass-eul ttae cheoleom geudeul-ui him-eulo modeun geos-eul myeolmangke hayeossnola
